name: iBike
short_description:
This app is an easy-to-use bike sticker generator which has full support for official patterns of Suzhou High School of Jiangsu Province.
Users can use this app to design their own styles. The output stickers are printer-friendly and able to be printed in bundle.
PS. In order to run this app correctly, please check your system requirement. For those using Windows XP or Vista, please install Microsoft .net Framework 3.5 or later if you haven't done so. Version 3.5 SP1 is recommended. The installer will guide you through if you are running a lower version of Framework. 
=====
*More
=====
If you still encounter many problems in installation, launching or generating, I suggest you download the latest hotfix in the hotfix folder.
The current hotfix solves issues about launching failure and stock font whose version is lower on WinXP.
For those using NON-INSTALLER version for the first time, installing this hotfix is strongly recommended. This hotfix doesn't require any more config.
summary: Official bike sticker generator from Alex Qian (SZHS)
